about_the_game:
The humans fled for their lives! Now only aliens remain in the city. The alien queen lays eggs, and the aliens become more numerous and slowly mutate over time. Your name is Mark, a professional marksman. You have one mission, to kill the alien Queen! Your helicopter buddy will provide you with supplies during the mission.

But This Will Not Be Easy...


INTENSE ACTION
Shoot, slash, and blast your way through different types of mutated aliens in this dark post-apocalyptic world. Arm three different sharpshooter weapons and unlock weapon modifications and special upgrades in the arsenal.





UNLOCKS
Unlock Sick Special attacks, Secrets, Skins, and Mods for your weapons! The more you unlock in-game, the more the you can control the Mission's difficulty and outcome. You are in control, go Easy or Challenge yourself to the maximum... If you think you are worthy of the Crown...



MUTANTS
From small crawling creatures to giant spinning spiky meatballs. This game has six unique mutants that will protect their mother at all costs!



Short but intense main story!

SETTINGS
Graphics, Window/Fullscreen, and Resolution Settings.
Keybindings menu, Medium or High mouse Sensitivity, and Inverted or Regular Mouse-Look settings.
Music ON/OFF.

Good Luck Mark, and don't get lost in the Dead End...

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood, gore, and body parts explode.
Drugs and alcohol use.
Strong language and dark adult comedy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 10/Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD Ryzen FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lowest Settings 1280 1024 Resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 10/Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Highest Settings 1920 1080

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
